goal.ch: Computers play an important role in our daily life and in industry. For examples, most of processes in industry are controlled by computers; theoretical computation and molecular simulation are important tools for engineers and scientists for doing research and product development. The main purpose of this course is to introduce C++ as a programming tool for future chemical and material engineers. The course will take a pragmatic approach that incorporates actual engineering and science problems for its applications and examples.
goal.en: Computers play an important role in our daily life and in industry. For examples, most of processes in industry are controlled by computers; theoretical computation and molecular simulation are important tools for engineers and scientists for doing research and product development. The main purpose of this course is to introduce C++ as a programming tool for future chemical and material engineers. The course will take a pragmatic approach that incorporates actual engineering and science problems for its applications and examples.

outline.ch:
1. 學習程式語言前的暖身知識
2. C++程式語言的基本概念
3. 指派運算子與程式的輸入輸出
4. 流程控制：條件判斷(If, else, else if, switch)
5. 流程控制：迴圈 (for, while, do-while)
6. 函數
7. 陣列
8. 文字檔案處理：輸入及輸出
9. 字串處理
10. 指標
11. 類別與物件的簡介
outline.en:
1. Basic Concepts before Programming
2. Getting Started in C++
3. Assignment, Input, and Output
4. Selection
5. Repetition
6. Functions
7. Arrays
8. Data Files and File Streams
9. String Class
10. Pointers
11. Object-Oriented Programming (Classes)"

textbook.ch:
1. C++ Programming Principles and Practices for Scientists and Engineers, 4th ed., G. J. Bronson, Cengage Learning, 2013.
2. C++ How to Program, 7th ed., P. Deitel and H. Deitel, Pearson Education Inc., 2010.

ch.competencies: 具備運用數學、科學、工程知識以及現代化工具解決工程領域問題之能力
具備發掘問題、設計規劃、實驗分析、詮釋數據與執行工程專題與專業之能力
具備專業表達、語言、撰寫之能力
具備溝通整合、團隊合作與領導之多元發展之能力
具備產業結構之洞察力，社會責任之認知與永續經營之理念
具備工程倫理與人文素養、強化國際觀，並養成終身學習之動力
